messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

create cannot log into workday template for tuesday create cannot log workday template hello please create template incidents table also assignment default thanks kindest regards specialist pl

It mentions "workday template" and "create," which could lean towards "Access" or potentially "HR Support."
